sentences.en: Broadcast news was accurate and reliable but deadly dull.
sentences.cn: 新闻广播准确可靠但却非常枯燥。

sentences.en: Doctors can get the wrong impression from even an accurate description.
sentences.cn: 即便很精确的病历也可能让医生产生错误的印象。

sentences.en: He was once described as a fussily accurate test pilot.
sentences.cn: 他一度被称为过分讲究精准的试飞员。

sentences.en: Her description of the nature and action of poisons is amazingly accurate.
sentences.cn: 他对一些毒药的性质和作用的描述惊人地准确。

sentences.en: I work very efficiently and am decisive, and accurate in my judgement.
sentences.cn: 我工作非常有效率，处事果断，而且判断准确。

sentences.en: It is difficult to get accurate figures on population numbers.
sentences.cn: 很难取得精确的人口统计数字。

sentences.en: Le Tissier hit an accurate cross to Groves.
sentences.cn: 勒蒂西耶将球准确地横传给了格罗夫斯。

sentences.en: Marks were given for accurate spelling and punctuation.
sentences.cn: 因拼写及标点正确而得分。

sentences.en: Some pulsars keep time better than the earth's most accurate clocks.
sentences.cn: 某些脉冲星发送脉冲比地球上最精确的时钟都准时。

sentences.en: The book is remarkably accurate and transparently fair-minded.
sentences.cn: 这本书记述确凿，言辞明晰，见解公正。

sentences.en: The book, so far as I can judge, is remarkably accurate.
sentences.cn: 就我看来，这本书内容相当准确。

sentences.en: The brochure tries to give a fair and accurate description of each hotel.
sentences.cn: 该手册尽量公正、准确地介绍每一家酒店。

sentences.en: The figure is accurate to two decimal places .
sentences.cn: 这个数精确到小数点后两位。

sentences.en: The pilots, however, were not as accurate as they should be.
sentences.cn: 然而飞行员并不像他们该达到的水平那样精准。

sentences.en: To remove any ambiguity we have to acquire more accurate information.
sentences.cn: 为了消除含糊不清,我们必须取得更加精确的情报.

trans.tran_en: correct and true in every detail
